meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jeremy Eaton Lincoln Hamilton Kelly Bayles Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7315.

td.p: Jeremy Eaton, a graduate student and instructor originally from Gambrills, Maryland
Lincoln Hamilton, a writer originally from Irving, Texas
Kelly Bayles, a librarian from Tulsa, Oklahoma (whose 2-day cash winnings total $37,500)

tr.td: STATE CAPITAL NICKNAMES
TAROT CARDS
POLITICAL BOOKS
MISSING MOVIE NAMES
(Alex: You fill in the gap.)
LIKE A G-6
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with a "G" and have six letters.)
(Kelly: Some say it's the best in the country, and some say the best in the city is here at Arthur Bryant's.)
